author: wetravelwell_11
title: Great Value - and restraurant next door is excellent too!
text:
I rated this 4 because of the price and quality of the hotel in the heart of Manhattan.
The room cleanliness and decor was just as nice as any Marriott/Hilton/Sheraton, just smaller...And how much time do you spend in your hotel room anyway while in NYC???!!!
And, for 1/3 to 1/2 the price -- it is fantastic. And, Cafe Saju next door is a lovely, convenient place to dine - don't miss it!
Room Tip: inside/backside rooms are very quiet See more room tips
